excerpt: https://arxiv.org/abs/2005.09704">Contextual Residual Aggregation for Ultra High-Resolution Image Inpainting"(CVPR 2020 Oral

citation.excerpt: Unofficial Pytorch Re-implementation of "Contextual Residual Aggregation for Ultra High-Resolution Image Inpainting"(CVPR 2020 Oral).
if you have more than one GPU, please change following codes:

description.excerpt: The code is based on implementation of deepfillv2. Thanks for the great job. The project is still in progress, please feel free to contact me if there is any problem. Besides Contextual Residual Aggregation(CRA) and Light-Weight GatedConvolution in the paper, also add Residual network structure, SN-PatchGAN in this project.

--gpu_ids [the ids of your multi-GPUs] 
Default training process uses hinge loss as the D_loss, also provide Wgan-GP in the code. 
For input size of 512x512 and GPU with memory of 11GB, recommended batchsize is 4.
Pytorch Re-implementation of "Contextual Residual Aggregation for Ultra High-Resolution Image Inpainting"(CVPR 2020 Oral)

installation.excerpt: Before running, please ensure the environment is `Python 3.6` and `PyTorch 1.2.0`. Dataset: Download Places365-Standard for Training and Testing.
if you have more than one GPU, please change following codes:

invocation.excerpt: To change other training parameters, please modify train.py. You can also design your own mask through dataset.py

long_title.excerpt: High Resolution Image Inpainting Based on GAN
